module.name: BEAM Python Interface
module.description: This modules allows for integrating new data processors written entirely in Python 2.7 or 3.3+. As it uses CPython, developers can use any Python native extensions such as numpy, scipy, etc. The bundled README.md file provides the instructions how to setup BEAM for Python development.
